textAfterTable: View only items available in your size 70% polyester, 27% rayon, 3% spandex Dry Clean Only Made in USA 2 Pockets The charcoal fabric has a beautiful drape and the jacket is very flattering. Although this is supposed to be a "relaxed pant", I did find the pants to be a bit tight in the hip and seat area. Fortunately, it comes with a skirt as well, which has a very flexible and comfortable elastic waistband. No fit problems with the skirt. Overall, happy with the purchase. Reviewed by M. R. (Eden Prairie, MN), 6 months pregnant The suit runs smalls so I ordered up a size. The pants are cut too slim and the skirt is an odd shape. However, if I pull the skirt up higher on my abdomen it works ok. The jacket fits perfect and is very flattering because of the sash.
